properties.Observatio: There is currently no water in this well. It appear that the land on which this tube well is built is being illeagally occupied.
It was reported that they will face a severe water shortage during the dry season.

properties.Observatio: It is advisable to construct a new tube well after proper study.

Construction of a Tube Well

Drilling of tube well (5m deep) with supplying and fixing of 0.5 HP x 4" Dia tube well pump including all necessery connections and constructing a protective cell for the pump and mounting the same to good working order
